title: Need a Mid/Supp player ~ ranked team
body: I'm looking to recruit a member to a ranked team that plays both mid and sup. Any applications will be looked at, if there is more than 1 im more than happy to rotate you around with each other.

replies.body: Main support and can mid as well, interested
If this is still happening im keen to find some nice people to play with :)
Sure. I think this other player who friended me is also after the positions, I'll see if it is alright for you to alternate with each other, if not ill just redo the people per day ok.

F0oManChu

I play aggressive mids and supports mostly but am willing too conform if need be
